document_data.mainbody:
onyberry mead was a sweet alcoholic beverage flavored with fruit, honey, and spices that was brewed in the town of Conyberry on the edge of the Neverwinter Wood.
Conyberry mead was known to have beneficial effect on imbibers perception.
In the mid-to-late-15 century DR, Conyberry mead was sold by the Tarmalune Trade House in Neverwinter on the Sword Coast North.
